review: Hats of to this great entertainer called Nana Patekar. Every movie of his is different from each other. Must see movie before dying. In the near future society will be same as shown in this movie. No trust. Absolutely nail biting end of the movie. I am not shocked that people don't don't admire brain teaser movie as this one. It is an eye opener to the coming future. Superb movie.

Taken or rather inspired from the Hollywood movie 'Recruit', the movie doesn't evoke the emotions the way 'Ab Tak chhappan' did. Slightly above average at best. Needed crisp script and better director.
